channel.title: Switch Magiks Command
channel.description:
I'm a newbie just so you know....
I'm trying to learn how to make commands, but if anyone could help me making a switch magiks command it would be really appreciated. I've seen it on a few servers so....
Anything Helps...
Also I need to know how to change my welcome screen (change what it says in the chat box as in "Welcome to Runescape", I don't want the new Runescape welcome screen, kind of pointless...

item.title: Switch Magiks Command
item.dc:creator: @zezimaisme111 zezimaisme111
item.description:
@zezimaisme111 wrote:

[quote=“Hoodoo Sleep, post:4, topic:159943”][code]
public int usingAncient = false;
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“switch”)) {
if(!usingAncient) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
} else if(usingAncient) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
}
}

[/code]

if (command.startsWith(“switch”)){
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
animation(435, absY, absX);
RemoveAllWindows();
if (ancients == 1) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 0;
sendMessage(“You convert to normal magic!”);
} else {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 1;
sendMessage(“You convert to ancient magicks!”);
}
}[/quote]

firstly, he might not know what da hell your on about coz you got 2 commands
and secondly you havent explained what the top code does and were to put it (important) lol

Read full topic

item.title: Switch Magiks Command
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

public int usingAncient = false;
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch")) {
if(!usingAncient) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); 
} else if(usingAncient) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
}
}

if (command.startsWith(“switch”)){
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
animation(435, absY, absX);
RemoveAllWindows();
if (ancients == 1) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 0;
sendMessage(“You convert to normal magic!”);
} else {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 1;
sendMessage(“You convert to ancient magicks!”);
}
}

Read full topic
